attributes.action: upgrade the A303 through Somerset / Dorset / Wiltshire to continuous dual carriageway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A303 is a major East / West trunk link.
At the present time the sections running through Somerset, N.Dorset and Wiltshire are a mixture of short sections of dual carriageway and two way main road.
The road has a high volume of traffic to such levels that the points where the traffic has to converge back to single lane working, and the queues this causes, are a major accident risk area plus the cause of many lost man hours, traffic fumes and highly inefficient use of fuel.
A major upgrade would actually help the environment by allowing traffic to flow far more freely, reduce driver hours, reduce accident potential and driver (road rage) frustration.
